mapper.select: SELECT faq.id, faq.deleted, faq.created_at as createdAt, faq.modified_at as modifiedAt, faq.title, faq.content FROM faq WHERE faq.id = #{id}
SELECT faq.id, faq.title, faq.deleted, faq.create_user_id as createUserId, faq.created_at as createdAt, faq.modified_at as modifiedAt FROM faq WHERE faq.id is not NULL
